Generation V.Black: These bird Pokémon are excellent divers. They swim around in the water eating their favorite food--peat moss.
Generation V.White: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
Generation V.Black 2: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
Generation V.White 2: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.

Generation VI.X: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
Generation VI.Y: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It's not very good at flying yet. It watches the dances of its Swanna parents to learn how to move its wings.
Generation IX.Violet: It strengthens its body by diving in to the depths of ponds, swimming around while looking for bog moss to eat.

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Mossfell Confluence , Fellhorn Gorge , Oni Mountain , Kitakami Wilds Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
